#summary Expression accesser
#labels Language

Note: The 'handles' system is still under heavy researchs and modifications.

= Introduction =

The Handle is a system of _key, value_ pair.
{{{a :- b}}} is the object whose key is {{{a}}} and value is {{{b}}}.

The key/value operators leads :
{{{& (a :- b)}}} to be {{{a}}}
{{{* (a :- b)}}} to be {{{b}}}

= Usage

The synthax {{{fct[prm]}}} is a shortcut to {{{*fct( prm :- _ )}}} or, indeed {{{img; fct(prm:-img)}}}
